msg.msgText:
The IBM MessageSight server can be backed up by using the "backup" option of the "imaserver" command. The IBM MessageSight store can be optionally backed up to an FTP or SCP server.
SYNTAX: imaserver backup help imaserver backup <Options>
EXAMPLE: imaserver backup "Password=backpwd" imaserver backup "Password=backpwd" "StoreDestinationURL=scp://yyy.yyy.yyy.yyy/store_backup" "StoreDestinationUserID=aaaaa" "StoreDestinationPassword=bbbbb"
The valid options are: Password The password for the backup encryption. StoreDestinationURL The optional remote destination for the store backup file. StoreDestinationUserID The user ID to access the remote destination. StoreDestinationPassword The password to access the remote destination. NOTES: 1. "Password" is a required item. 2. Options are specified as "key=value" pairs. 3. Each "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks. 4. The "backup" operation can be performed only by the system administrator "admin". 5. The "backup" operation requires that the IBM MessageSight server is in maintenance mode. Use "imaserver runmode maintenance" command to set IBM MessageSight server to maintenance mode. 6. "StoreDestinationURL", "StoreDestinationUserID" and "StoreDestinationPassword" must all be specified to back up the store. 7. The "StoreDestinationURL" value must specify either the FTP or SCP protocol and must include the file name.
